data.title: Composable Words
data.statement:
You are playing a word game.

You must check if each of [[n]] words, [[word]], are valid or not.

To check if they are valid, you must see if each [[word]] is made only from characters in [[l]].

Each character in [[l]] may be <<used once>>, <<more than once>>, or <<not used at all>> to form the [[word]]s.
Each word is always <<UPPERCASE>>.

testCases.title: Similar Letters.
testCases.testIn:
5
G A R E D
GREED DARED DREAD FEARED RAGE
testCases.testOut:
"GREED" is valid.
"DARED" is valid.
"DREAD" is valid.
"FEARED" is invalid.
"RAGE" is valid.

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
5
T R E O D
TREE FJORD RED REED TROD
testCases.testOut:
"TREE" is valid.
"FJORD" is invalid.
"RED" is valid.
"REED" is valid.
"TROD" is valid.

testCases.title: Sorry Paris!
testCases.testIn:
7
A E I O U T R S C D N M L W B
MOSCOW BRUSSELS ROME PARIS LONDON BERLIN TURIN
testCases.testOut:
"MOSCOW" is valid.
"BRUSSELS" is valid.
"ROME" is valid.
"PARIS" is invalid.
"LONDON" is valid.
"BERLIN" is valid.
"TURIN" is valid.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
3
M A D E
MALAYSIA SCANDANAVIA ARGENTINA
testCases.testOut:
"MALAYSIA" is invalid.
"SCANDANAVIA" is invalid.
"ARGENTINA" is invalid.

testCases.title: Completely Invalid.
testCases.testIn:
10
F A E U Q N R D
BACK FACE HAND FEET CHEST LEGS ARMS HEAD SHOULDERS HIPS
testCases.testOut:
"BACK" is invalid.
"FACE" is invalid.
"HAND" is invalid.
"FEET" is invalid.
"CHEST" is invalid.
"LEGS" is invalid.
"ARMS" is invalid.
"HEAD" is invalid.
"SHOULDERS" is invalid.
"HIPS" is invalid.

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
10
A E I O U T R C
TRACK RACK TACK STACK STEAK KNACK KNOCK SOCK TALK CHALK
testCases.testOut:
"TRACK" is invalid.
"RACK" is invalid.
"TACK" is invalid.
"STACK" is invalid.
"STEAK" is invalid.
"KNACK" is invalid.
"KNOCK" is invalid.
"SOCK" is invalid.
"TALK" is invalid.
"CHALK" is invalid.

testCases.title: Check the Usernames:
testCases.testOut:
"@5DN1L" is valid.
"@CODE_PARSER" is invalid.
"@CG_CHATBOT" is invalid.
"@NINTENDO" is valid.
"@USERNAME123" is invalid.
"@CHECK_THIS_NAME" is invalid.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testOut:
"@LIONEL%#" is valid.
"@LIONEL$" is invalid.
"@L$I#EL" is invalid.
"@IONEL89" is invalid.
"@LIONEL" is valid.
"@LIONEL9675" is invalid.
"@LIONEL%LIONEL" is valid.

data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
read l:string(50)
loopline n word:word(50)
write This Statement is invalid.
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1: >> An integer, [[n]], representing the amount of words, [[word]] to check.
<<Line 2: >> A string, [[l]] containing space-separated characters that each [[word]] must be composed of to be <<valid>>. If a [[word]] has a single-character that's not in [[l]], that word is <<invalid>>.
<<Line 3:>> [[n]] [[word]] separated by spaces
data.outputDescription: <<[[n]] Lines: >>A validation: {{"[[word]]" is valid.}} or {{"[[word]]" is invalid.}}

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are playing a word game.

You must check if each of n words, word, are valid or not.

To check if they are valid, you must see if each word is made only from characters in l.

Each character in l may be used once, more than once, or not used at all to form the words.
Each word is always UPPERCASE.
Input
Line 1: An integer, n, representing the amount of words, word to check.
Line 2: A string, l containing space-separated characters that each word must be composed of to be valid. If a word has a single-character that's not in l, that word is invalid.
Line 3: n word separated by spaces
Output
n Lines: A validation: "word" is valid. or "word" is invalid.
Constraints
1 <= n <= 10
2 <= length of word <= 50
Example
Input
2
A B D
DAB BAD
Output
"DAB" is valid.
"BAD" is valid.
